duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with the Head of Communications to expand and execute ACLED’s overarching communications strategy.
Lead implementation of public outreach and user engagement plans, per the communications strategy.
Manage and review publications to ensure they adhere to the organization’s research agenda.
Coordinate with ACLED’s Access and Sales teams to produce marketing collateral and branding materials.
Coordinate with ACLED’s Operations and Programs departments to develop and execute an event strategy to hold webinars, panel discussions, and conferences.
Identify opportunities for growth in the Communications department and oversee recruitment of new team members.
Develop and carry out media and public relations training programs for ACLED team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Public Relations, Media, or a related field (Master's preferred)
